name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Fred M. HATT, Appellant

judges: Mr. Justice Montemuro did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Fred M. HATT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Mr. Justice Montemuro did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael J. Cammarano, Reading, for appellant.
James M. Bucci, Charles B. Coleman, Narcy L. Hughes, Reading, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
623 A.2d 321
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Fred M. HATT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 8, 1993.
Decided April 30, 1993.
Michael J. Cammarano, Reading, for appellant.
James M. Bucci, Charles B. Coleman, Narcy L. Hughes, Reading, for appellee.
